channel.itunes:keywords: spep, media, ministry, sermons, severna, park, pca, glenn, parkinson
channel.title: Transforming Grace Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Severna Park EP Church
channel.description: Severna Park EP Church is located in Pasadena MD. We are a PCA Church. Our website is http://spepchurch.org. Services happen at 9:30 and 11AM Sunday mornings. Links to internet feeds of our services can be found on our webpage.
channel.itunes:summary: Severna Park EP Church is located in Pasadena MD. We are a PCA Church. Our website is http://spepchurch.org. Services happen at 9:30 and 11AM Sunday mornings. Links to internet feeds of our services can be found on our webpage.
channel.itunes:subtitle: A church where Jesus mends broken lives with the goodness of God, and equips us to join him in his work.
